trade up.translation[0].definitions[0].d: to replace something you own with something better, or buy a better type of thing than before
trade up.translation[0].definitions[0].e: It also encourages existing home owners to trade up to larger accommodation.
trade up.translation[1].definitions[0].d: to buy more expensive goods that are of better quality
trade up.translation[1].definitions[0].e: Thousands of small-apartment owners are trading up for more luxurious accommodation.
Home-computer buyers are trading up to machines with more power and speed.
